### Week 3: Organizing your research
<br>
**Before the workshop:**
<ul>
<li>Please download (and unzip) this set of files: <a href="/workshop_files/2022/research-skills/learnShell.zip" download>learnShell.zip</a>
<li>If you do not have a code editor installed yet (or don't know what a code editor is), please download one. A few popular options are [Sublime Text](https://www.sublimetext.com/){target="_blank"} and [Atom](https://atom.io/){target="_blank"}.
<li>If you are using a Windows computer, please download [Git Bash](https://gitforwindows.org/){target="_blank"}. This will allow you to use commands that are native to macOS and Linux operating systems.
